category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 12 (Subject of Deliberation)
contents: Article 12 (Objects of Deliberation) ① The Committee deliberates and decides on the following matters related to legislation. 1. Enactment and revision of the regulations of the Sports Council 2. Presentation of opinions and authoritative interpretation of the regulations of the Sports Council 3. Other necessary matters regarding legislation ② The resolution of Paragraph 1, Subparagraph 1 shall be made by the Board of Directors in accordance with Article 33, Paragraph 2, Subparagraph 2 of the Articles of Incorporation. It is enacted and revised through resolution, etc. ③ Deliberation of matters related to the authoritative interpretation of the regulations of the Sports Council pursuant to Article 3, Paragraph 2 and Article 12, Paragraph 1, Item 2 shall be conducted only when there is a request by the Sports Council, and matters deliberated and resolved by the Committee regarding the authoritative interpretation shall be This is the final decision of the Sports Council in this regard. Newly established 2022. 1. 24.
